forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with thundershowers this afternoon following a period of morning rain. High 9C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
